extendedInfo.description: Common Core Resource Search is an easy way to search thousands of Common Core-related resources. Parents, teachers, and other education professionals can use Common Core Resource Search to browse the Common Core standards or search for resources by keyword.To get started, tap the text field at the top of the screen and enter a keyword or standard. You can also select one of the boxes to browse the standards or read education related headlines by selecting news.We are adding new resources to our index every month!
